unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Hardik Pandya's ankle? Hope he's recovering well. Dr. Sharma at Kokilaben Hospital is top-notch. Also, heard Ravi got injured during the Ranji Trophy. Rs. 5 Lakhs insurance should cover his treatment. Wish him a speedy recovery and back on the 22 yards! Heard the NCA physio is helping him out in his 1200 sq ft room.
